subject: Surfing
Tidal Waves
lead_paragraph: In the tiny village of Berimanua, Indonesia, a tsunami swept in half a mile up a wide creek from the ocean. But against the backdrop of devastation, a few miles away, it was surf’s up.
snippet: In the tiny village of Berimanua, Indonesia, a tsunami swept in half a mile up a wide creek from the ocean. But against the backdrop of devastation, a few miles away, it was surf’s up.
